title: BMC poll results: Suspense over one seat in south Mumbai as candidates tie | mumbai news | Hindustan Times
text:
BMC poll results: Suspense over one seat in south Mumbai as candidates tie mumbai Updated: Feb 23, 2017 17:44 IST Hindustan Times Now the winner would be declared by lottery.(File) 
There was suspense and drama over one seat in South Mumbai in which BJP candidate/ex-MLA Atul Shah and Shiv Sena’s Surendra Bagalkar are tied. It is 220 – C ward in South Mumbai. 
Initially in the first round, Bagalkar was declared a winner by three votes after which Shah asked for recounting. In the recounting, they tied with 5946 votes each. 
Now the winner would be declared by lottery. 
Read more:
